scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --workspace gatsby-source-prismic" "npm run dev --workspace gatsby-plugin-prismic-previews" --names "source,previews" --prefix-colors magenta,blue
scripts.release: npm test && npm run build && lerna publish
scripts.release:alpha: npm test && npm run build && lerna publish --dist-tag alpha --preid alpha
scripts.release:beta: npm test && npm run build && lerna publish --dist-tag beta --preid beta
